front.title: LDAP schema for storing SCRAM secrets

abstract.t: This memo describes how the "authPassword" LDAP attribute can be used for storing secrets used by the Salted Challenge Response (SCRAM) mechanism in the Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) framework. Note A revised version of this draft document will be submitted to the RFC editor as a Proposed Standard for the Internet Community. Discussion and suggestions for improvement are requested, and should be sent to sasl@ietf.org mailing list.
